src_lang: The benefits of the RDB collaboration are also evident in the number of visitors to Visit Rwanda, where the number of followers on social media platforms such as Youtube increased by 100%, Instagram increased by 507%, Twitter increased by 72% and Facebook increased by 30%.
template: Inyungu kandi y’ubwo bufatanye RDB igaragaza ko ibonekera mu mubare w’abatangiye gukurikira ibikorwa byo gusura u Rwanda ( Visit Rwanda ) aho ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka Youtube ababikurikira biyongereye ku kigero cya cya 100 % , kuri Instagram biyongeye ku kigero cya 507 % , kuri Twitter biyongera ku kigero cya 72 % naho kuri Facebook biyongeyere ku kigero cya

text_to_decode.text: The benefits of the [ RDB ] collaboration are also evident in the number of visitors to Visit Rwanda, where the number of followers on social media platforms such as Youtube increased by 100%, Instagram increased by 507%, Twitter increased by 72% and Facebook increased by 30%.
